answers.answer: It isn't that bad and I don't know what you mean by doped up all I had was an epidural my head was clear. You can only feel tugging and pulling the recovery is worse than the actual procedure

I'm sayin in general all the cutting the procedure in general looks like A LOT!!! N OBVIOUSLY U ARE DOPED US AS UN U HAVE AN EPI THERE FOR U DONT FEEL ANYTHING!!! DIDN'T MEAN TO GET U IN UR FEELINGS DANG...JUS MY OPINION N I HOPE I DO NOT HAVE TO GET ONE.. THANKS FOR UR COMMENT THO :)

Lol no feelings here yep lots of cutting 5 layers of skin are cut through and usually when I think of doped up I think of like you're head is all messed up like you're high or something lol. I didn't want one either but I had preeclampsia and tried to get induced it didn't work and it was awful pain so they finally just gave me a c section
GOTCHA N UNDERSTAND THE HEALING PROCESS MY SIS HAD ONE N IT WAS HARD CANT MOVE LAUGH COUGH EX...BUT UMK SORRY I WAS JUST SAYING UNDERSTAND IF THEY HAVE TO FOR U N BABY BUT LOOK FRIGHTENING
It definitely is scary going into the operating room and all the bright lights and everyone around you . Yes coughing sneezing. Laughing all that stuff is so painful!!
Hah doped up yeah right they don't give you **** like that.
That's why mom's are on the other side. So you can't see anything and all you feel is pressure and tugging. Not pain.

I watched one also and it freaked me out but I've already had one...I just didnt know what they were doing until I saw the video. As for recovery mine wasn't bad at all and I was up and walking around the next day. The sooner you start moving around the sooner you'll heal but hopefully you'll get to have a natural birth and you won't have to worry about that.

I do not want a c section niether. Scares the **** out of meeee :((((((( my mom had 3 c sections! n the scar looks nasty /: I just hope ny baby comes out through my vagina! How long does it take to heal afterwards? & does it really hurt alottt?  :0 how does the pain feel afterwards?

YA I'M SURE WITH OUT THT CURTAIN THERE ALOT OF MOMS WOULD PROBABLY HAVE PANIC ATTACKS!!! I Want mine recorded tho n if worst come to worst ill definitely have my bf record the very last second when they are pulling the head out...but thnks for the comments ladies :):):):)

question: Tell me y at 35 weeks I decide to watch c section videos on YouTube...wtf was I thinking??? I'm freaking terrified nw...I really hope my lil man comes on his own!! Everyone makes it seem like no big deal but I guess that's  because they are doped up..omg lol sorry just had to share my thoughts..tht junk looks crazy. Sooooo much cutting... May the lord be with us all :):):)
title: C SECTION...OMG
